comments: Dosunmu (CHI) gets to the ball as Toppin (IND) is airborne during his shot attempt and still makes contact with it when Toppin lands.
Nembhard (IND) and Caruso (CHI) both engage and separate as they pursue the loose ball after the jump ball.
White (CHI) extends his arm into Haliburton's (IND) front, which affects his SQBR during the drive.
Siakam (IND) moves alongside Dosunmu's (CHI) path and absorbs the body contact during the driving shot attempt.
Caruso (CHI) follows the shot anticipating a rebounding opportunity when he and Turner (IND) come together, causing incidental contact to occur.

Siakam (IND) engages with Dosunmu (CHI) off-ball and marginal contact occurs as Siakam releases away to retrieve the post entry pass. Dosunmo gets tangled up with his teammate Vucevic (CHI) thereafter.
Vucevic (CHI) legally contests Turner's (IND) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Turner (IND) establishes himself in Caruso's (CHI) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Caruso (CHI) inbounds the ball in under 5 seconds.
Nembhard (IND) maintains verticality and absorbs the contact that occurs during DeRozan's (CHI) driving shot attempt.
Nesmith (IND) dislodges the ball off DeRozan's (CHI) hands, causing it to go out of bounds. Possession correctly remains with IND.
Siakam (IND) cleanly blocks the layup attempt before incidental body contact occurs with White (CHI) as both players are landing.
Siakam (IND) cleanly blocks the shot attempt prior to when the ball reaches its apex.
Vucevic (CHI) commits a take foul on Nesmith (IND) in the frontcourt.
Nesmith (IND) grabs and pulls DeRozan's (CHI) jersey away from his body to commit a take foul. The contact occurs before DeRozan's upward shooting motion on the perimeter.
DeRozan (CHI) removes his resting hands from Toppin (IND) as Toppin elevates toward the rebound and tips it out.
Toppin (IND) deflects the ball out of bounds. Possession is correctly awarded to CHI.
DeRozan (CHI) gathers the pass on his left foot and takes two legal steps before his shot attempt.
McConnell (IND) contests the jump shot attempt and avoids making contact with DeRozan's (CHI) arm.
Haliburton (IND) releases the throw-in towards the basket and after making contact with the rim, the ball is deflected by Jackson (IND) and the game clock expires.
Turner (IND) aligns alongside Vucevic's (CHI) path when marginal contact occurs, which Vucevic can move through.
Vucevic (CHI) removes his resting hand from Haliburton's (IND) off-arm after his gather.
Haliburton (IND) reaches for the ball when he makes contact with it and marginal contact with Dosunmu's (CHI) shoulder during the driving shot attempt.

After Siakam's (IND) release on his driving shot attempt, he follows through, and marginal contact occurs with Craig (CHI). Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Craig (CHI) initiates contact with Haliburton's (IND) arm, which affects his driving shot attempt.
McConnell (IND) makes marginal contact with DeRozan's (CHI) arm after he secures the pass.
Siakam (IND) commits a take foul on DeRozan (CHI).
Haliburton (IND) commits a take foul on DeRozan (CHI).
Caruso (CHI) closes out behind Haliburton (IND) and legally contests Haliburton's jump shot attempt.
